name: The Humane Slaughter Association
bossPosition: Chief Executive Officer and Scientific Director
memberOrga: The HSA has corporate members which support the charity through their membership fee and receive publications, but it does not have member organisations in the sense of organisations that direct policy or activities.
goal:
The Humane Slaughter Association (HSA) is an international charity which works to improve welfare for food animals during transport, marketing, slaughter, and killing for disease control and welfare reasons. It works through research, education, training, technical advances and scientific meetings to bring practical, lasting improvements in food animal welfare worldwide.

Registered Charity in England and Wales No 1159690:Charitable Incorporated Organisation
